devdoc.details: Note: This contract is protected via a permissioned account set in the role manager.  Caution should be used as the role owner could renounce the role leaving all future actions disabled.  Additionally, if a malicious account was able to obtain the role, they could use it to set values to malicious values. See the public documentation website for more details.

initialize(address).details: initializer to call after deployment, can only be called once

setApprovedCuratorVaults(address,bool).details: Setter for the list of curator vaults allowed to be used

setFreeReactionLimit(uint256).details: Setter for the amount of reactions allowed per free reaction

setNativeWrappedToken(address).details: Setter for the native wrapped ERC20 token (e.g. WMATIC)

setSpendReferrerBasisPoints(uint256).details: Setter for the spend referrer basis points

setSpendTakerBasisPoints(uint256).details: Setter for the spend taker basis points
